title: Personalized Language Learning Design Through MOOC Learner Behavior Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Literacy and Online Learning Experience
context.additional_context: Behavior Analytics-Based Customized Educational Design for Language Learning Targeting Professionals (Medical/Legal/Technical)

learning_goals: Learners can identify individual learning patterns by analyzing behavioral data collected from MOOC platforms
Learners can design weekly learning plans and content recommendation systems based on analysis results
Learners can develop personalized feedback mechanisms (quizzes, assignments, discussions) to enhance language learning outcomes
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
